results.abstract: At Simon & Schuster, Alfred A. Knopf and The New Yorker, he polished the work of a who’s who of mid-to-late 20th century writers.

results.title: To Fight Book Bans, Illinois Passes a Ban on Book Bans
results.abstract: Gov. J.B. Pritzker said the law, which came amid a recent rise in book-banning efforts, was the first of its kind. At least one other state is weighing similar legislation.

media.caption: Illinois’s new law will require that state libraries uphold a pledge not to ban material because of partisan disapproval, starting on Jan. 1, 2024.

results.title: Paul McCartney Says A.I. Helped Complete ‘Last’ Beatles Song
results.abstract: The song was made using a demo with John Lennon’s voice and will be released later this year, McCartney said.
